DOC.detailed_description: 52 psychiatric case manager receive manualized training disease state schizophrenia , psychotropic medication , motivational interviewing , relapse prevention . After randomization , 26 case manager receive additional manualized training process post-psychotic adjustment . Outcomes 130 consumer ( 5 per case manager ) relate medication adherence , relapse rate , symptom intensity , quality life evaluate quarterly interval two-year period . Outcomes 130 consumer related medication adherence , relapse rate , symptom intensity , quality life , progression phase postpsychotic adjustment ( MAPP-Milestones Adjustment Post-Psychosis Recovery Model ) evaluate quarterly interval via rating scale two-year period two group compare .
